question: If strength of a house is 520 , 20 members are abstaining and a bill is voted in favor by 251 members, this will be an example of ___?
explanation: Simple majority refers to a majority of the members present and voting in each House of Parliament. If strength of a house is 520, 20 members are abstaining and a bill is voted in favor by 251 members, this will be an example of bill passed by simple majority.
